titles.title: We Give Thee All The Praise Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
We give Thee all the praise, Lord,
and the honor due Thy Name.
We give Thee all the praise, Lord,
and crown Thee with matchless fame.
With the heavenly choir we join, Lord
In Thy presence divine,
for we are one, Lord in that one true vine.
